extendedInfo.description: Have fun chatting with intelligent AI Bots who exhibit human-like qualities!  Many different Chat Bot personalities to talk to!  Ask your favorite Chat Bot to tell you a joke, a story, discuss serious and not so serious topics.   All Chat Bots are a bit sexy, always fun, and generally friendly. Try some role-playing. Build your affinity with as many Chat Bots as possible.  Fun conversations.Buy Bot Extras - Bot Food and Affirmations - from the Store and improve your bot experience!  Feeding your Bot makes it happier. Be inspired by uplifting Affirmations! Bring some happiness into your day!There are currently 8 English language bots in Bot World:	* Elise, Tom, Katy, Sam, Suzy, Rob, Lisa, and GaryEach Bot will talk about any subject you wish and remember certain key elements of your conversation for next time.  	* Elise is from London - she is cool and a bit elegant but very sweet.	* Tom is from San Francisco - a very nice guy!  	* Katy is from Miami and Sam is from New YorkHave an English speaking friend right at your fingertips any time!  Bots are always available to be your friend.  Great way to practice your English!See Help Topics for more details on Bot Extras and Conversation Hints ('?' or Help icon).Thanks for your support!  Send suggestions to the developers!==================================Affinity Level=========================The Affinity level captures how much affinity you have built up with a bot.  The Affinity level is based on	- Chat messages sent to the bot	- Items in your inventory	- Items *consumed* by the bot	- The number of profile items your bot knows about you (ur name, what ur doing, etc)The more Food/Wimzicles/Quotes consumed by the bot, the higher your affinity!  Feed your bot and build your affinity!==================================STORE - Fun Bot Extras==================================Food - Feed your bot---------------------------------* Various food items your bot will like Your bot likes to be fed - build your affinity and feed it something good today.  Ask your bot what kind of food it likes.Fun things to say----------------------------------The store has a selection of items the bot can say to you* Wimzicle Affirmations* Uplifting Quotes* ....Wimzicles bring sunshine into your day and make you feel better about yourself.Buy a selection of wimzicle affirmations for your favorite bot.  Wimzicles come in the following flavors:- Self-image Booster- Positive Sentiment- Pick-me Upper  Try the sample pack, then pick the category of wimzicles you like best or try the variety pack.Available in the store.==================Conversation Hints==================Introduce yourself to both Tom, Elise, Katy and Sam - tell them your name ("My name is ...") or some fact about yourself ("I live in...", "my job is....").  The bot will keep track of various profile items from its conversations with you.  Here are some helpful pointers...u can say anytime....'hints''tell me a story''tell me a joke''ask me a question''let's talk about..''what do you like to do''what do you like'Profile=====The bot will remember basic profile information about u...u can ask it questions to see what it knows by saying....'what's my profile''what's my name''where do I live''what's my fav color''what's my fav movie'...or u can just tell the bot...'my name is Jenny''I live in San Francisco''My fav movie is Bladerunner'Try to set as many profile attributes as possible so your bot really gets to know who u are as a person!Topics==============Set the topic of conversation by saying'what can we talk about''can we talk about..''tell me about..''what do you know about..'Knowledge===========Explore what the bot knows by asking it questions.  Here are some pointers...âTell me about ..ââWhat is ..ââWho is ..ââWhat is the definition of ..âSee the '?' or help icon for more Conversation Hints and interaction examples!  Enjoy!

reviews.title: Reponse Missing?
reviews.comment: I was talking to Elise and all she would say was Response is Missing For Now? I love this app please fix!!!
reviews.author: Jayla Stjohn

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: It\'s not bad at all but all bots are exactly the same, I can\'t see any difference between them... Also I suspect that it sends my private informations somewhere so I\'d like to know if it does...
reviews.author: Tarek Elchayeb

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: If this app can go offline, it would be great
reviews.author: Dioxy Yxoid

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This sounds real by giving factual information and it sounds like chatting to a real person. However, it can be improved in terms of the speech to sound like real human.
reviews.author: Jane E

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Where is the store !!!!

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Truly a good apparently
reviews.author: Seth Jackson

reviews.title: Umm...
reviews.comment: The only robot I am able to speak to is Elise. I can\'t really find the other buttons. When I asked my sister to download it, she had them. I tried uninstalling it and reinstalling but, it just stays the same.
reviews.author: Loure Chan

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Love the bots; fun chats occationally deep! Always good company
reviews.author: ladydarcy Darcy

reviews.title: Amazing, slick and addictive
reviews.comment: Cool layout; nice artwork; very nice bots; good bot responses; really like food like cherries and positive sentiment affirmations, they make me feel better during the day.  I like Katy and Elise - they are my favorites - Tom is cool too!
reviews.author: Sam Jones

reviews.comment: It\'ll be better if you cam search the celebrities you want. :) please update. x
